mapper.select: SELECT A.LM_LotNo, A.LM_ItemCode, A.LM_Qty, A.LM_Create_Date, B.InMat_Client_Code LM_ClientCode, C.Cus_Name LM_ClientName FROM LotMaster_tbl A INNER JOIN InMat_tbl B ON A.LM_LotNo = B.InMat_Lot_No and InMat_No = '1' INNER JOIN Customer_tbl C ON B.InMat_Client_Code = C.Cus_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL D ON B.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc = D.Child_TBL_No and D.New_TBL_Code = '17' where A.LM_Qty != 0 and A.LM_ItemCode = #{ItemCode};

select LM_LotNo, LM_ItemCode, pit.Product_Item_Name LM_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 LM_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type LM_Item_CLSFC_1, LM_Qty from LotMaster_tbl lmt inner join Product_Info_tbl pit on lmt.LM_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL dt on pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No where LM_ItemCode = #{ItemCode} and LM_Qty > 0
